ihs.apcs.spacebattle

Class BasicGameInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ihs.apcs.spacebattle.BasicGameInfo
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaubleHuntGameInfo, DiscoveryQuestGameInfo, HungryHungryBaublesGameInfo, KingOfTheBubbleGameInfo

    public class BasicGameInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    The BasicGameInfo provides Score, HighScore, and Number of Deaths. It is the basis for most other games. It is also used for smaller 'games' which may be used to lead up to more complex ones.
    Since:
    1.0
